I was looking at streetwear brands in Toronto and came across Defiant Supply. Their streetwear joggers were exactly what I wanted and the quality feels super premium! Really glad I bought the face mask as well, it's way more comfortable than the disposable ones and compliments the pants really well! Overall, I would highly recommend checking them out!
